name: Jasim The Great
description:
Jasim the great is about a soldier who is hunted down by the shadows, he has to escape them and finds new friends and weapons

Please keep in mind this is in heavy development.

the future updates will include:

smoother gameplay

enemy ai

larger map

graphical changes 

more weapons 

more levels 

more low poly look

Story

multiplayer

samurai weapons 

please give me feedback as this is in its beta state

Controls: 

WASD; movement 

G : grenade

Q: knife attack 

L-Shift: Sprint
